name: Reliance Group Holdings
overview: Reliance Group Holdings, Inc. operates as the holding company of Reliance Insurance Company and its subsidiaries. The Reliance Group consists of Reliance National, Reliance Insurance, Reliance Personal, Reliance Reinsurance, and Reliance Surety. Reliance National offers commercial property and casualty insurance products and services for large companies, and smaller account workers’ compensation insurance. Reliance Insurance Company provides commercial property and casualty insurance coverage for mid-sized companies, and also offers coverage for more complex risks. Reliance Personal writes personal automobile insurance. Reliance Reinsurance offers treaty and facultative reinsurance for small to medium sized regional and specialty insurance companies located in the US. Reliance Surety writes surety bonds and fidelity bonds. Reliance Group Holdings Inc. was formerly known as Reliance Financial Group Inc. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is based in New York, New York.
